Name: Microtransaction Simulator
About the game: Microtransactions Who doesn't love shelling out $60 for a season pass when the original game is $40? Or what about grinding chests to get the perfect loot you want? Or getting that non-gameplay enhancing cosmetic that has a 1/6000 unlock chance? Save your money with the free to play game Microtransactions Simulator A twist on the classical clicker style game where you unlock achievements, get better loot, sell loot, and upgrade your shop. Yet to Come: Quests with loot More achievements More loot types (not only cards) Useless stuff Music made by: Michael Brock Li
